input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Carolina Pine Garland"
Reference Product Description:
This Carolina Pine garland features mixed bristle and cashmere branch tips and is trimmed with pine cones. It is pre-strung with 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This indoor, outdoor garland can be displayed over doors, windows, fireplace mantels, fence or stairway railings.

Designed with a Norwood Fir branch base, this pre-lit artificial Christmas garland is 9 feet long and decorated with pine cones.
Features 100 warm white battery operated LED lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
Suitable as an indoor or outdoor Christmas decoration, drape this garland over any door, window or entryway to add a festive feel to any area of the house.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials and hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this garland is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='National Tree Company Norwood Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit Northern Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9 ft. Decorative Collection Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9 ft. Glittery Bristle Pine Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Decorative Collection Valley Pine Garland'
  - Name='Sunnydaze 9' Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland with Timer'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6' Flocked Artificial Christmas Garland with 50 White Warm LED Lights and Pine Cones'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='MacKenzie-Childs Tartastic Illuminated Garland'
  - Name='Vickerman 9 ft. Silver White Pine Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Antique Fir Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Jamali Lighted Faux Garland'
  - Name='Northlight 9' Multi-Function Color Changing Fiber Optic Artificial Pine Christmas Garland'
  - Name='Galarza 72'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland Andover Mills'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6ft. Snow Tipped Christmas Artificial Garland with 35 Clear LED Lights and Pine Cones'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6.5ft. Lighted Artificial Eucalyptus Garland with 100 Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9 ft. Pre-Lit Decorative Collection Garland with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Northlight Madison Pine Artificial Christmas Garland'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6 ft. Decorated Christmas Artificial Garland with Battery Operated LED Lights'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' x 10" Pre-Lit Northern Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit and similar length; different pine variety (Northern Pine) and different brand but similar function and appearance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9 ft. Decorative Collection Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length and pre-lit with clear lights, but no specific pine type stated and different brand. Decorative but less specific features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9 ft. Glittery Bristle Pine Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, same length, bristle pine like reference, pre-lit with clear lights, but uses glittery finish, which may change appearance slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Decorative Collection Valley Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pine garland, but no length or lighting details. Valley pine rather than Norwood Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sunnydaze 9' Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Garland with Timer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit and 9 feet long, but no pine type or decorations mentioned. Timer adds feature but different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6' Flocked Artificial Christmas Garland with 50 White Warm LED Lights and Pine Cones
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Includes pine cones and pre-lit with warm lights similar to reference, but shorter length (6'), flocked (snowy) appearance differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Pre-Lit Canadian Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland, different pine type (Canadian Pine), no length given, different brand, likely similar use.
Illuminated garland but likely more decorative/artistic with different style; no pine or length info, different brand and probable different construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Vickerman 9 ft. Silver White Pine Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same length pine garland but silver white pine suggests an artificial snowy or decorative look, not standard Norwood Fir style, different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Antique Fir Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir garland of unknown length with antique style; different brand, no indication of lights or pine cones.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Jamali Lighted Faux Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Lighted faux garland but no indication of pine/fir type, length, or pine cones; likely decorative but less specific match.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9' Multi-Function Color Changing Fiber Optic Artificial Pine Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit pine garland 9' with color-changing fiber optics, which differs notably in lighting style and ambiance from warm white LEDs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Galarza 72'' in. Lighted Faux Pine Garland Andover Mills
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit faux pine garland with lights, but shorter length (6 ft) and possibly different style/quality, different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6ft. Snow Tipped Christmas Artificial Garland with 35 Clear LED Lights and Pine Cones
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Decorated with pine cones and pre-lit with clear LEDs similar to reference, but shorter length and snow tip finish differs from reference's natural look.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6.5ft. Lighted Artificial Eucalyptus Garland with 100 Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Garland is eucalyptus not pine/fir, though often used decoratively; length shorter and style differs significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9 ft. Pre-Lit Decorative Collection Garland with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, 9 ft and pre-lit with clear lights; lacks details on pine type and pine cones, but highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Madison Pine Artificial Christmas Garland
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial pine garland, different pine variety (Madison Pine), no length or lighting details, different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6 ft. Decorated Christmas Artificial Garland with Battery Operated LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and battery-operated LED lights like reference; shorter length and unspecified pine type but decorated similarly.
